N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 671.1 - Purpose of this part

State Regulations

It is the general purpose of this Part to implement the
policy of the State with regard to the release of waters from certain
reservoirs, as set forth in title 8 of article 15 of the Environmental

Conservation Law. Accordingly, it is the specific purpose of this Part to
regulate the release of waters from Cannonsville reservoir into the West Branch

Delaware River, from the Pepacton reservoir into the East Branch Delaware

River, and from the Neversink reservoir into the Neversink River, in order to
protect and enhance the recreational use of those rivers and the Delaware

River, while ensuring and without impairing an adequate supply of water for
power production or for any municipality which uses water from such reservoirs
for drinking and other purposes, and while ensuring and without impairing the
rights or interests of Pennsylvania, New Jersey and Delaware in the waters of
the Delaware River basin. Notes
